Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label a fish in its water habitat.
The student can include other plants and animals that live in the same habitat as the fish.
The student can show and label what the fish needs to survive, like water and food.
The student can illustrate and label how the fish and its environment are part of a system that works together.
The student can demonstrate understanding of how the habitat provides the necessary resources for the fish.
